meanings.sent1: I love wearing my cozy woolies during the winter.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of woolies to keep warm.
meanings.sent3: The woolies kept him snug as a bug in a rug.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of woolies was a rainbow of warmth.
meanings.sent5: The soft woolies felt like a hug from a cloud.

meanings.definition: Woolies: A store chain in Australia.
meanings.sent1: Let's go shopping at Woolies for groceries.
meanings.sent2: I found a great deal on snacks at Woolies.
meanings.sent3: I bumped into my friend at Woolies while buying bread.
meanings.sent4: The Woolies store was bustling with shoppers.
meanings.sent5: Shopping at Woolies always puts a smile on my face.

meanings.definition: Woolies: A slang term for woolen socks or mittens.
meanings.sent1: My grandma knitted me a pair of woolies for Christmas.
meanings.sent2: He lost one of his favorite woolies on the ski trip.
meanings.sent3: She pretended her woolies were secret superhero gloves.
meanings.sent4: The mismatched woolies made him look like a quirky artist.
meanings.sent5: His colorful woolies were the envy of his friends.
